thread.section_title: Homeadvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homeadvisor | www.homeadvisor.com | 2 of 385
thread.title: Thomas Hull

author: Thomas Hull
title: Thomas Hull
text: I am new to the area where my wife and I recently purchased a home, and have no experience with or knowledge of good, reliable contractors for plumbing, heating, electrical work, etc., in that vicinity. Using Home Advisor allowed me to find highly rated companies/individuals for a plumbing repair project and a furnace assessment and servicing project that needed to be completed. I was very happy with the work that was conducted, and thought the prices charged were very reasonable considering the work that was done. I would happily use either company again in the future, if/when needed.
